file.name: openapi.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
servers:
  - url: http://api.nytimes.com/svc/archive/v1
  - url: https://api.nytimes.com/svc/archive/v1
info:
  x-ballerina-display:
    label: New York Times Archive
    iconPath: "icon.png"
  description: >
    This is a generated connector for [New York Times Archive API v1.0.0](https://developer.nytimes.com/docs/archive-product/1/overview) OpenAPI specification. 
  
    With the New York Times Archive API you can get all NYTimes article metadata for a given month. The Archive API returns an array of NYT articles for a given month, going back to 1851. Its response fields are the same as the Article Search API. 

    The Archive API is very useful if you want to build your own database of NYT article metadata. You simply pass the API the year and month and it returns all articles for that month. The response size can be large (~20mb).
  termsOfService: http://developer.nytimes.com/tou
  title: Archive API
  version: 1.0.0
  x-ballerina-init-description: >
    The connector initialization requires setting the API credentials. 
  
    Create a [NYTimes account](https://developer.nytimes.com/accounts/login) and obtain tokens following [this guide](https://developer.nytimes.com/get-started).
  x-apiClientRegistration:
    url: http://developer.nytimes.com/signup
  x-apisguru-categories:
    - media
    - open_data
  x-logo:
    url: https://static01.nyt.com/images/icons/t_logo_291_black.png
  x-origin:
    - format: openapi
      url: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nytimes/public_api_specs/master/archive_api/archive_api.json
      version: "3.0"
  x-providerName: nytimes.com
  x-serviceName: archive
externalDocs:
  url: http://developer.nytimes.com/
security:
  - apikey: []
paths:
  "/{year}/{month}.json":
    get:
      operationId: getArticles
      description: |
        The Archive API provides lists of NYT articles by month going back to 1851.  Simply pass in the year and month you want and it returns a JSON object with all articles for that month.
      parameters:
        - description: The year (e.g. 2016).
          in: path
          name: year
          required: true
          schema:
            default: "2016"
            format: int32
            maximum: 2030
            minimum: 1851
            type: integer
          x-consoleDefault: "2016"
        - description: The month number (e.g. 1 for January).
          in: path
          name: month
          required: true
          schema:
            default: "1"
            format: int32
            maximum: 12
            minimum: 1
            type: integer
          x-consoleDefault: "1"
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                properties:
                  response:
                    properties:
                      docs:
                        items:
                          $ref: "#/components/schemas/Doc"
                        type: array
                      meta:
                        properties:
                          hits:
                            type: integer
                          offset:
                            type: integer
                          time:
                            type: integer
                        type: object
                    type: object
                type: object
          description: The docs requested.
      summary: Archive API
      tags:
        - Archive
components:
  schemas:
    Doc:
      properties:
        _id:
          type: string
          nullable: true
        abstract:
          type: string
          nullable: true
        blog:
          items: {}
          type: array
          nullable: true
        byline:
          properties:
            organization:
              type: string
              nullable: true
            original:
              type: string
              nullable: true
            person:
              items: {}
              type: array
              nullable: true
          type: object
          nullable: true
        document_type:
          type: string
          nullable: true
        headline:
          properties:
            kicker:
              type: string
              nullable: true
            main:
              type: string
              nullable: true
          type: object
          nullable: true
        keywords:
          properties:
            name:
              type: string
              nullable: true
            rank:
              type: string
              nullable: true
            value:
              type: string
              nullable: true
          type: object
          nullable: true
        lead_paragraph:
          type: string
          nullable: true
        multimedia:
          items:
            properties:
              caption:
                type: string
                nullable: true
              copyright:
                type: string
                nullable: true
              format:
                type: string
                nullable: true
              height:
                type: integer
                nullable: true
              subtype:
                type: string
                nullable: true
              type:
                type: string
                nullable: true
              url:
                type: string
                nullable: true
              width:
                type: integer
                nullable: true
            type: object
          type: array
          nullable: true
        news_desk:
          type: string
          nullable: true
        print_page:
          type: string
          nullable: true
        pub_date:
          type: string
          nullable: true
        section_name:
          type: string
          nullable: true
        slideshow_credits:
          type: string
          nullable: true
        snippet:
          type: string
          nullable: true
        source:
          type: string
          nullable: true
        subsection_name:
          type: string
          nullable: true
        type_of_material:
          type: string
          nullable: true
        web_url:
          type: string
          nullable: true
      type: object
  securitySchemes:
    apikey:
      in: query
      name: api-key
      type: apiKey
      description: Represents API Key `api-key`

Error: parse: parse spec: paths: /{year}/{month}.json: get: operation "getArticles": parameters: parse parameter "year": schema: parse default: expected type "integer", got "string"
